summary: This is an internal FBI New York email chain discussing preparation for an interview with the ADIC (Assistant Director in Charge) about human trafficking cases. The email mentions using high-profile cases like Epstein and NXIVM as examples, along with other recent trafficking investigations.

persons.name: Kenney
persons.context: Copied on the email regarding human trafficking matters.

connections.description: MI requests information from I about human trafficking cases for an ADIC interview.
I invites M to a prep meeting with the ADIC.

events.title: Planned ADIC Interview on Human Trafficking
events.description: The Assistant Director in Charge (ADIC) of FBI New York is scheduled to do a podcast interview about human trafficking.

events.title: Prep Meeting for ADIC Interview
events.description: A preparation meeting is scheduled between the email author (I) and the ADIC, with an invitation extended to M.

keyFacts: The FBI New York office was preparing a senior official (ADIC) for a media interview on human trafficking in January 2020.
High-profile cases like Epstein and NXIVM were explicitly mentioned as potential examples to discuss in the interview.
The email references specific recent Department of Justice press releases on sex trafficking convictions and arrests in the SDNY and EDNY.
The communication shows the FBI's public affairs strategy of using notable cases to illustrate their human trafficking enforcement work.
